LOGIN.LOGIN_HEADING: Log in with your Artstor account
LOGIN.INSTITUTION_LIST_INFO: This is not a complete list of subscribing institutions. Institutions listed have provided single sign-on or proxy access. If your school is listed, select it from the dropdown and you will be redirected to your institutional login page to gain access to Artstor.
LOGIN.SERVER_ERROR: Server is not responding. Please try again later.
LOGIN.TERMS: By using Artstor Digital Library, I agree to the Terms
LOGIN.WRONG_PASSWORD: Invalid email address or password. Try again.
LOGIN.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
LOGIN.EXPIRED: That login is expired. Please login from campus to renew your account.

REGISTER.REGISTER_HEADING: Register for a new Artstor account
REGISTER.REGISTER_DESCRIPTION: Registering for an account lets you download images, save them to groups, create presentations, and share them with other Artstor users.

ERRORS.AGE_REQUIRED: Please confirm you are 13 or older
ERRORS.LOGIN_SERVER: Server is not responding. Please try again later.

REGISTER.AGE_PROMPT: I confirm that I am 13 or older
REGISTER.AGE_PROMPT_HOVER: If you are under 13, please provide your legal guardian's email address to register
REGISTER.INFO_PROMPT: Yes, send me information about new Artstor content and tools
REGISTER.PRIVACY_DISCLAIMER: Artstor will not share your personal information except in limited instances as set forth in its privacy policy.
REGISTER.FIELDS_REQUIRED: Please note that all form fields are required.

CHANGE_PASS.GENERAL_ERROR: There was a network error. Please try again some other time.
CHANGE_PASS.WRONG_PASS_ERROR: The password is not correct for this account

DOWNLOAD_LIMIT_MODAL.TITLE: Download Limit Reached
DOWNLOAD_LIMIT_MODAL.MAIN_BODY: You have met your download limit.

DELETE_IG.TITLE: Delete Image Group
DELETE_IG.MAIN_BODY1: Are you sure you want to delete

FROM_SELECTED.TITLE: Add Images to Group
FROM_SELECTED.ADD_FAILURE: Unable to add images to group. Sorry about that.
FROM_SELECTED.OPEN_CREATE_GROUP_MODAL: Create a new group with images

FROM_ASSET.TITLE: Add Image to Group
FROM_ASSET.ADD_FAILURE: Unable to add image to group. Sorry about that.
FROM_ASSET.OPEN_CREATE_GROUP_MODAL: Create a new group with image

NEW_GROUP_MODAL.PERMISSION_FIELD_LABEL: Who should see this image group?
NEW_GROUP_MODAL.SHOW_ADD_TO_IMAGE_GROUP: Add item to existing image group
NEW_GROUP_MODAL.CREATE_SUCCESS: You've successfully created an image group
NEW_GROUP_MODAL.CREATE_FAILURE: Oops, something went wrong and your group was not created. Please try again.
NEW_GROUP_MODAL.EDIT_SUCCESS: You've successfully edited the image group

LOGIN_REQUIRED_MODAL.HEADING: User account required
LOGIN_REQUIRED_MODAL.PROMPT: Please log in or Register to save images.

ERRORS.NO_INSTITUTIONAL_COLLECTIONS_PROMPT:
There are no institutional collections available for your institution. You can add institutional collections using Shared Shelf.

Learn more about Shared Shelf.
ERRORS.NO_PRIVATE_GROUPS_COLLECTIONS_PROMPT: You haven't made any private groups yet. Learn more about groups.
ERRORS.NO_INSTITUTIONAL_GROUPS_COLLECTIONS_PROM: You haven't made any institutional groups yet. Learn more about groups.

ACCESS_HELP_MODAL.HEADING: How do I get access?
ACCESS_HELP_MODAL.PROMPT:
Access is provided to subscribing institutions

If you belong to a subscribing institution, find out how to use remote access methods

If your institution is not a subscriber, find out how they can be

ACCESS_DENIED_MODAL.HEADING: Content Unavailable
ACCESS_DENIED_MODAL.PROMPT: If you are already logged in, this may be due to content limitations or your institutional access.

SHARE_IG_LINK_MODAL.SERVICE_ERROR: We've encountered an error in getting a share token. Please refresh or try again later.

ORGANIZE.TITLE: Organize
ORGANIZE.NEW_GROUP: Save Selections to New Image Group
ORGANIZE.EXISTING_GROUP: Save Selections to Existing Image Group

BETA_SKY_BANNER.MESSAGE: You are previewing the beta site of the new Artstor Digital Library platform. Learn about what's new.
